name: Milky Way Explorer
description:
Game made for the Trijam Game Jam on the theme Fun with physics

Ran into a fair few issues with this game so didn't manage to make it within the 3 hours sadly. 

Send the explorer out across the milky way to gather data on the other planets when in range. You can choose the launch speed and launch angle, the rest is up to the gravitational pull of the planets. Collect as much data as you can, and don't crash into a planet, or drift outside of their gravitational pull, otherwise it's game over. Remember, the slower you approach a planet the more time you have to gather data, but don't go too slow, or you'll get sucked in! Good luck. (Use mouse wheel to zoom in and out).

The further away from earth the planet is, the larger the volume of collected data.
